content.question: The figure shows connected wires in a portion of a circuit. What is the magnitude of the current <math alttext="I" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>I</mi></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="6 amperes" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>6</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math>
<math alttext="12 amperes" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>12</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math>
<math alttext="18 amperes" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>18</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="12 amperes" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>12</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math>

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
